title: SME Automation and Digitalisation Facility (ADF)
description: BNM facility to incentivise SMEs to automate and digitalise operations. Financing up to RM3m, tenure up to 10 years, financing rate up to 4% p.a.
eligibility: Malaysian SMEs with ≥51% Malaysian ownership, as defined by SME Corp. Must not use funds for refinancing.
requiredDocs: Applications submitted directly to PFIs; supporting docs per bank’s credit assessment.
